name: Snapback (itch)
description:
Godot Wild Jam #39   

 Theme: Inversion
    Wildcard: Prithee, speak!       
               

           Snapback is a stealth-based dungeon crawler, with a twist.

 Use your magical hat and invert from the
corporeal realm to the ethereal realm.

 Collect as many coins in both realms as you can.

   Discover why you're in the dungeon and
accomplish your quest.

Controls Move - W, A, S, D  or Arrow Keys
Sneak - Shift to toggle
Invert Realms - Space Bar
Interact - E Key

 
    

Snapback was made using Godot,
 Aseprite, and FL Studio

CREDITS
  Artist - Jenna Wing-Hu (Memao)
Developer - Bryan Reed (Bronsky)
Developer - Ross Root (SleepingRobot)
 Music/SFX - Tyler Young (Young Tango)
Level Design - Dugan Eckstein (Ex)

     



Godot Particle Effect Tutorials by Picster
Godot Shader Tutorials by Nolkaloid 
Godot Text-To-Speech add-on by TNTC-Lab
Godot Dialogue Tutorials by Rafa Fiedo
